title: Getting the same skin and champion shards on different accounts?
body: I'm getting same skin and champion shards on 3 different accounts. What is going on, is the system made so that i get the same stuff if my accounts are connected or is it a bug?

replies.body: Would you happen to have screenshots showing where you've been getting exactly the same loot on different accounts? It's pretty unlikely since those accounts aren't linked in any way, but I'm really curious to see what might be happening.
